title: 1  BEDROOM 1.5 BATH TOWNHOME MIDTOWN
posting_body: THIS 1 BEDROOM  1 AND A HALF BATH IS AMAZING!
LOCATED IN THE HEART OF MIDTOWN EVERYTHING YOU NEED IS WITHIN WALKING DISTANCE.
THIS UNIT HAS LOTS OF CHARACTER INCLUDES ALL NEW APPLIANCES, WASHER/DRYER IN UNIT!.
CALL TO SCHEDULE A TOUR TODAY!!
WE ARE LOCATED AT 27 E. WILLIS ST.
WE ARE BOOKED SOLID MORNINGS AND WEEKENDS; HOWEVER WE HAVE MONDAY-FRIDAY AVAILABLE 2-6 PM STOP BY OR CALL TODAY!!
